SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class UserDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<UserEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.UserDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserDao extends AbstractDao<UserEntity>
Provides database operations for UserEntity instances. This class extends AbstractDao to inherit common database operations and is marked as Stateless to indicate that it does not maintain any conversational state with clients.
See Also:

    • checkPassFromEmail

      public boolean checkPassFromEmail(String email, String password)
      Checks if the provided password matches the one stored for the user with the given email.

      password - The password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise.

    • getUserProjectCreationDto

      public List<Object[]> getUserProjectCreationDto(int userId, List<Integer> rejectedUsersId, int usersPerPage, int page, LabEntity lab, String keyword, List<String> skillNames)
      Retrieves a list of users for project creation, excluding certain users and applying filters.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user performing the search.
      rejectedUsersId - A list of user IDs to exclude from the results.
      usersPerPage - The number of users to return per page.
      page - The page number of the results.
      lab - The lab entity to filter by.
      keyword - A keyword to filter the results.
      skillNames - A list of skill names to filter the results.
      Returns:
      A list of Object arrays containing user information.

    • getNumberUserProjectCreationDto

      public int getNumberUserProjectCreationDto(int userId, List<Integer> rejectedUsersId, LabEntity lab, String keyword)
      Counts the number of users matching the criteria for project creation.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user performing the search.
      rejectedUsersId - A list of user IDs to exclude from the count.
      lab - The lab entity to filter by.
      keyword - A keyword to filter the results.
      Returns:
      The count of users matching the criteria.

    • getUserSkills

      public List<SkillEntity> getUserSkills(int userId, List<String> skillNames)
      Retrieves the skills of a user filtered by skill names.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      skillNames - A list of skill names to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of SkillEntity objects representing the user's skills.

    • getUsersPerLab

      public List<Object[]> getUsersPerLab()
      Retrieves the number of users per lab.
      Returns:
      A list of Object arrays where each array contains the lab name and the count of users in that lab.
